name: Planet Express
description:
Fly between space stations, dodging comets and avoid overheating your engines! The indicators in the lower right show the color and direction of the next delivery.

  • Control
    • Press space to spawn and respawn
    • Rotate ship with left and right arrow keys
    • Fire the engines with the up arrow key

This game was created for a mini-LD jam back in 2016.

  • This game uses the following assets:
    • Poly Planets by DIAMOND FOX
    • Astra Starship Fleet Package by Daniel Kole Productions
